hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" | grep -qE '\.py$'; then flake8 "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" --max-line-length=150 --ignore=E501,W503,E402,E722,E203 --quiet 2>/dev/null || true; fi
if echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" | grep -qE '\.(env|secret|key)$|mcp\.env'; then echo 'BLOCKED: Cannot edit secrets/env files' >&2; exit 1; fi
